---
title: "Useful R functions"
output: html_document
---

## 1. `sample()`

Take a sample of designated size from the elements of a vector. 

## 2. `subset()`

Return subsets of vectors, matrices or data frames by condition.

## 3. `range()` 

Return a vector containing the minimum and maximum of all the given arguments. 

## 4. `strwrap()`

Wrap long character strings to format paragraphs at the designated column width. 

## 5. `filter()`

Function used to subset data frames meeting specified conditions.
